duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and provide customer service leadership, training, and coaching, alongside the Store Leader, for all store employees.
Maintain high retention by identifying qualified applicants, developing leaders, empowering employees, and encouraging employee productivity.
Assist in implementing all merchandising and marketing programs.
Handle cash, fuel transactions, and promote the loyalty program.
Maintain a clean, safe environment by complying with all health and sanitation procedures.
Communicate effectively and maintain product stock.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED preferred, but not required for candidates with at least one year of Retail Management experience.
Valid Driver’s License and automotive liability insurance.
